24. Scheme of arrangement between Sterlite Technologies Limited, our Company and their respective shareholders as sanctioned by the High Court of Bombay by way of its order dated April 22, 2016.
25. Scheme of amalgamation between Sterlite Power Grid Ventures Limited, our Company and their respective shareholders as sanctioned by the National Company Law Tribunal, Mumbai Bench by way of its order dated May 22, 2020.
26. Scheme of amalgamation between Sterlite Grid 4 Limited, our Company and their respective shareholders as sanctioned by the National Company Law Tribunal, Mumbai Bench by way of its order dated February 17, 2022.
27. Scheme of arrangement between Sterlite Grid 5 Limited, our Company and their respective shareholders as sanctioned by the National Company Law Tribunal, Mumbai Bench by way of its order dated September 5, 2024.
28. Shareholders' agreement dated November 8, 2024, entered into amongst our Company, Twin Star Overseas Limited, South Asia Growth Fund III Holdings, LLC, South Asia EBT Trust III and Volrado Venture Partners Fund III - BETA.
29. Waiver cum Amendment Agreement to Shareholders' agreement dated November 8, 2024, read with deed of adherence dated June 16, 2025, entered into amongst our Company, Twin Star Overseas Limited, South Asia Growth Fund III Holdings, LLC, South Asia EBT Trust III and Volrado Venture Partners Fund III - BETA.
30. Trademark license agreement dated April 1, 2022, read with amendment agreement dated February 7, 2025, between STL and our Company

32. Share subscription agreement dated November 14, 2024, amongst our Company, Twin Star Overseas Limited and Volrado Venture Partners Fund III - BETA.
33. Term sheet dated September 16, 2025, between our Company and Lumiker Aplicaciones Technologicas S.L.
34. Application filed by our Company dated September 29, 2025, seeking exemption under Regulation 300(1)(c) of the SEBI ICDR Regulations for disclosing information and confirmations from Shiv Bhagwan Gupta, Prem Gupta, Ashwani Gupta, Urmila Kanwatia and Janak Dulari Nagori and entities/ and bodies corporates/ firms/ HUFs in which the aforesaid persons have/may have interest (individually or in aggregate with our Individual Promoter), as part of the promoter group of our Individual Promoter, in terms of the SEBI ICDR Regulations based on the information as available in the public domain.
35. Tripartite agreement dated September 6, 2024 amongst our Company, NSDL and Registrar to the Offer.
36. Tripartite agreement dated of September 6, 2024 amongst our Company, CDSL and Registrar to the Offer.
37. Due diligence certificate dated September 29, 2025, addressed to SEBI from the BRLMs.
38. In-principle listing approvals dated [●] and [●], issued by BSE and NSE, respectively.
39. Final observation letter bearing number [●] dated [●] issued by SEBI.
